caption.title: Table of study sets currently included in the SpikeForest analysis.
caption.p: Study sets fall into three categories: paired, synthetic, and curated. Each study set comprises one or more studies, which in turn comprise multiple recordings acquired or generated under the same conditions.

tr.td: Subselected from 64, 128, or 256-ch. probes, mouse cortex
Tetrodes or silicon probe (one shank) in rat hippocampus
Hybrid juxtacellular-Si probe, behaving mouse, various regions
Subselected from 374, 127, or 32-ch. probes, mouse cortex
Subselected from paired recordings from four labs
BioNet simulation containing no drift, monotonic drift, and random jumps; used by JRCLUST, IronClust
Distributed with KiloSort2, with and without simulated drift
Synthetic waveforms, Gaussian noise, varying SNR, channel count and unit count
Simulated using MEAREC, varying SNR and unit count
Simulated using MEAREC, varying SNR and unit count
Simulated by Quiroga lab by mixing averaged real spike waveforms
Three manual curations of the same recordings
